data.lyric:
[ti:Kiss and Make Up]
[ar:Dua Lipa/BLACKPINK]
[al:Dua Lipa (Complete Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]Kiss and Make Up - Dua Lipa (杜娃·黎波)/BLACKPINK
[00:00.02]Composer：Zacharie Raymond/Mathieu Jomphe-Lepine/Dua Lipa/Teddy Parker/Marc Vincent/Chelcee Grimes/Yannick Rastogi
[00:00.03]
[00:09.13]Dua Lipa：
[00:09.42]We haven't talked all morning
[00:10.68]
[00:11.51]Bang my head bang my head against the wall
[00:14.43]I'm scared I'm falling
[00:16.49]Losing all losing all my control
[00:19.25]And I'm tired of talking
[00:21.92]Feel myself saying the same old things
[00:24.35]But this love's important
[00:25.83]Don't wanna lose don't wanna lose you this way
[00:28.78]Dua Lipa/Rosé：
[00:28.97]I I I I I I I I I
[00:31.40]Feel like we about to break up
[00:34.13]I I I I I I I I I
[00:36.87]Just wanna kiss and make up one last time
[00:39.09]Dua Lipa：
[00:39.32]Touch me like you touch nobody
[00:41.66]Put your hands all up on me
[00:44.07]Tired of hearing sorry
[00:46.11]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[00:48.80]How about we leave this party
[00:51.17]'Cause all I want is you up on me
[00:53.66]Tired of hearing sorry
[00:55.66]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[00:58.62]Kiss kiss and make up
[01:00.44]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[01:03.57]Kiss kiss and make up
[01:05.21]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[01:07.30]Jennie/Jisoo：
[01:07.32]아직 너를 못 떠나고
[01:10.19]뭘하고 있는건지
[01:12.17]언젠가는 다 끝날걸
[01:14.97]변난걸 알지만
[01:16.79]고장난 우릴
[01:19.16]다시 고쳐볼 수는 없을지
[01:21.47]아무런 말도 넌 하지마
[01:24.67]마지막은 없어
[01:26.35]Lisa/Rosé：
[01:26.63]I I I I I I I I I
[01:29.38]Feel like we about to break up
[01:31.40]I I I I I I I I I
[01:34.25]Just wanna kiss and make up one last time
[01:36.53]Rosé/Lisa/Jennie：
[01:36.99]Touch me like you touch nobody
[01:39.13]Put your hands all up on me
[01:41.47]Tired of hearing sorry
[01:43.41]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[01:46.31]How about we leave this party
[01:48.65]'Cause all I want is you up on me
[01:51.03]Tired of hearing sorry
[01:53.10]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[01:55.80]Kiss kiss and make up
[01:57.87]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:00.98]Kiss kiss and make up
[02:02.62]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:04.75]Dua Lipa/Jisoo/Rosé：
[02:05.05]그게 뭐가 되었건
[02:06.64]다 필요없어
[02:07.39]너면 됐어
[02:09.15]So tell me can we work this whole thing out
[02:12.15]Work this whole thing out
[02:14.35]날 처음 만났던 설례는 순간
[02:17.04]그때 처럼
[02:18.78]So tell me can we work this whole thing out
[02:21.72]Work this whole thing out
[02:24.83]Kiss kiss and make up
[02:26.44]Dua Lipa/Rosé/Lisa/Jennie：
[02:27.05]Touch me like you touch nobody
[02:29.44]Put your hands all up on me
[02:31.79]Tired of hearing sorry
[02:33.81]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:36.64]How about we leave this party
[02:38.88]'Cause all I want is you up on me
[02:41.37]Tired of hearing sorry
[02:43.49]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:46.61]Kiss kiss and make up
[02:48.20]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:51.34]Kiss kiss and make up
[02:52.99]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[02:55.31]Dua Lipa/BLACKPINK：
[02:56.21]Kiss kiss and make up
[02:57.63]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
[03:00.93]Kiss kiss and make up
[03:02.61]Kiss and make kiss kiss and make up
data.trans:
[ti:Kiss and Make Up]
[ar:Dua Lipa/BLACKPINK]
[al:Dua Lipa (Complete Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.01]//
[00:00.02]//
[00:09.13]//
[00:09.42]整个早上我们都相对无言
[00:10.68]
[00:11.51]我将头一次次撞向墙壁
[00:14.43]我恐怕我已沦陷
[00:16.49]失去一切 失去所有控制力
[00:19.25]我厌倦了再度开口说些什么
[00:21.92]感觉自己总是说着那些陈词滥调
[00:24.35]但这份爱意义非凡
[00:25.83]不愿失去 不愿就这样失去你
[00:28.78]//
[00:28.97]我 我 我 我 我
[00:31.40]感觉你我快要无法挽回
[00:34.13]我 我 我 我 我
[00:36.87]只想最后一次与你深情热吻
[00:39.09]//
[00:39.32]给我从未给过的爱抚
[00:41.66]将你的手抚遍我的身体
[00:44.07]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[00:46.11]深情热吻 言归于好
[00:48.80]不如我们离开这狂欢的派对？
[00:51.17]我只想要拥抱你美丽的胴体
[00:53.66]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[00:55.66]深情热吻 言归于好
[00:58.62]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:00.44]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:03.57]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:05.21]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:07.30]//
[01:07.32]还是离不开你
[01:10.19]到底在做什么
[01:12.17]总有一天会结束
[01:14.97]已经变了 我清楚
[01:16.79]我们出了问题
[01:19.16]已经无法再次修理
[01:21.47]你什么话也不要说
[01:24.67]没有所谓最后
[01:26.35]//
[01:26.63]我 我 我 我 我
[01:29.38]感觉你我快要无法挽回
[01:31.40]我 我 我 我 我
[01:34.25]只想最后一次与你深情热吻
[01:36.53]//
[01:36.99]给我从未给过的爱抚
[01:39.13]将你的手抚遍我的身体
[01:41.47]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[01:43.41]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:46.31]不如我们离开这狂欢的派对？
[01:48.65]我只想要拥抱你美丽的胴体
[01:51.03]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[01:53.10]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:55.80]深情热吻 言归于好
[01:57.87]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:00.98]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:02.62]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:04.75]//
[02:05.05]那是怎样
[02:06.64]我不需要知道
[02:07.39]是你就行
[02:09.15]就告诉我 我们是否还有可能
[02:12.15]我们是否还有可能走下去
[02:14.35]正如初见我时 
[02:17.04]那心动的瞬间
[02:18.78]就告诉我 我们是否还有可能
[02:21.72]我们是否还有可能走下去
[02:24.83]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:26.44]//
[02:27.05]给我从未给过的爱抚
[02:29.44]将你的手抚遍我的身体
[02:31.79]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[02:33.81]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:36.64]不如我们离开这狂欢的派对？
[02:38.88]我只想要拥抱你美丽的胴体
[02:41.37]早已厌烦道歉的话语
[02:43.49]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:46.61]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:48.20]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:51.34]深情热吻 言归于好
[02:52.99]深情热吻 言归于好

[02:56.21]深情热吻 言归于好
